questions.describe: What type of record access can an Administrator grant through sharing rules?(Choose 2)
Which functionality is available when enhanced lists are enabled? (choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: Create new records from a list view
Calculate the sum of a number field displayed in a list view
Edit dependent picklists inline from a list view
Edit multiple records directly from a list view

questions.describe: What can a marketing user do using the Manage Members button on a campaign record? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: Associate existing opportunities with the campaign
Create a custom report including all campaign members
Associate existing contacts with the campaign
Import new leads and associate them with the campaign

questions.describe: What level of access can be set when sharing a document folder with users?(Choose 2)

Universal Containers uses a private sharing model for opportunities. The sales team wants sales engineers to be involved in specific opportunities to help sales representatives close deals faster. How can an administrator meet this request?

answerOptions.describe: Add sales engineers to account teams
Add sales engineers to opportunity teams
Enable Chatter Feed Tracking on opportunities

questions.describe: Sales executives at Universal Containers need to view a chart that displays opportunities grouped by stage and then by region. What chart type can a system administrator use to accomplish this?
What does the controlling field determine when field dependencies are being created?

answerOptions.describe: The values that appear in the dependent field
The dependent fields that appear on a layout
The default value populated in the dependent field
The field-level security for the dependent field

questions.describe: A user receives an error message when attempting to login to Salesforce. What is the first step the Salesforce administrator should take to troubleshoot the problem?
Criteria-based sharing rules can be created for which objects?
Which permission is required to convert a lead? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: "Create" and "Edit" access for leads, accounts, contacts and opportunities
"Transfer" access for leads, accounts, contacts, and opportunities

questions.describe: When using sharing rules, what can records be shared with?(Choose 2)
Universal Containers requires that its Salesforce account data, including attachments, be backed up weekly. Which tool should a system administrator use to accomplish this?
When importing data, what happens if some records do NOT meet the data validation criteria?

answerOptions.describe: Import process ignores the data validation criteria
Import process fails only for the records with invalid data
Import process aborts when it encounters the first invalid record
Import process requires user authorization to import the invalid records

questions.describe: When should a system administrator consider using the Salesforce AppExchange? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: To submit ideas for Salesforce application enhancements
To find answers to Salesforce application questions
When looking for pre-built custom applications and tools
When standard Salesforce functionality needs to be extended

questions.describe: A marketing user has received a file of leads to import into Salesforce. What is the best way to avoid duplicating records?
